attributes.action: IF VEHICLE TRACKING IS INTRODUCED THE MILLIONS OF FOREIGNERS WHO COME INTO THE COUNTRY BY FERRY WHO WEAR OUT OUR ROADS, SHOULD BE CHARGED AS WELL- OTHERWISE THEY WILL USE OUR ROADS FREE AND WE WLL BE PAYING FOR THEM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fairs fair, but what about all the others who come from abroad in their 44 tonners, touring busses, Tankers, and other huge heavy vehicles, not to mention the millions of cars too, they contribute NOTHING to the upkeep of our roads, ALL WEAR OUT OUR ROADS AND CAUSE CONGESTION TOO !! all at OUR expence. When we have to use their countres roads we have to pay road tolls to use them. Not fare is it ????
If you agree with me please sign to that affect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
